UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans Ingbritt(MIC=41.8±6.8µM),Streptococcus mutans Ingbritt(MBC=37.3±1.9µM),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 25586(MIC=2.5±0.3µM),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 25586(MBC=2.5±0.8µM)
